Description: Alinma Tokio Marine Co (known as: Alinma Tokio M) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since June 2012. Alinma Tokio M operates within the Insurance sector focusing on Multi-line Insurance. It has company operates across Saudi Arabia. Alinma Tokio M is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 2012.

Shareholder Name: Tokyo Marine and Nacedo Fire Insurance Ltd
